update salary_payment_record
employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_date = #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},

unemploy_insur = #{unemployInsur,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update salary_payment_record set employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_date = #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, pre_tax_salary = #{preTaxSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, final_salary = #{finalSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tax = #{tax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, deduction = #{deduction,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pension_insur = #{pensionInsur,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, medicare_insur = #{medicareInsur,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, housing_provident = #{housingProvident,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unemploy_insur = #{unemployInsur,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rule = #{rule,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pay_id = #{payId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
